text:
Website hacked

The website of JNU’s central library was hacked on Tuesday with a message displaying “You are thinking that you will get Kashmir just by barking in the Campus of JNU.” The hacking comes amid a row over an event at the university against the hanging of Afzal Guru and in solidarity with “struggle” of Kashmiri migrants, at Sabarmati dhaba. — PTI
title: ONLINE ATTACK
